titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Chinese Land Records, 1584-1978 EAL.2011.01
titlestmt.author: Yi Xu.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-07-08 17:30:20 -0400.

did.unittitle: Chinese Land Records
did.abstract: These Chinese Land Records are important and valuable primary documentation that reflect the land ownership in different historical periods, land tenure changes and land management system of China. As historical records they are indispensable for research and studies of Chinese politics, economy, social life, etc. Digital reproductions of the collection are available online. 这些珍贵的原始文献不仅提供了中国不同历史时期的土地所有，产权转让，土地管理系统的历史信息，也是研究中国政治史，经济史，社会生活史不可或缺的珍贵史料。检索指南包含了数字化副本​。
did.langmaterial: The language of the material in this collection is Chinese. 本收藏内容语种为中文

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: From Fujian, China in June 2011. 2011年6月购于中国福建。

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The land records are in chronological order. 所收文件依时间顺序排列。

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: After years tracing on internet in Feb. 2011 Haihui Zhang, Chinese Studies Librarian, got a phone contact with a private collector from Fujian Province, China who has collected Chinese land deeds. Upon Haihui's request the collector agreed to hold his land deed collection for ULS' consideration. In March, Dr. Hong Xu, the Head of EAL had a trip to Taiwan and stop by the collector's home in Fuzhou, Fujian Province. Hong took photos back. In June, Hong Xu and Haihui Zhang went to Shanghai for a conference titled "Chinese Studies in North America" and then took a trip to Fuzhou. They spend two days at the collector's home and purchased land deeds collected by the collector as a package. Then, a vendor from Beijing contacted the collector helped processing this purchase for ULS. 经过多年努力，中国研究馆员张海惠在2010年与一位私人收藏家取得了电话联系，了解其收藏情况，尤其是土地文书类原始文献。 2011年3月，匹兹堡大学东亚图书馆前馆长徐鸿赴台湾开会，之后短暂停留福州，并带回照片数枚。6月，徐鸿和张海惠参加在上海举行的"北美中国学研究国际学术讨论会"，会后再次前往福州并为匹兹堡大学图书馆购买了这批中国土地文书文献，以供学者研究之需。

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: No copyright restrictions. 无版权限制。

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: Digital reproductions of the collection are available online. 检索指南中包含了在线数字化副本。

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Chinese Land Records, 1584-1978, EAL.2011.01, ULS Area Studies, University of Pittsburgh 匹兹堡大学，特藏部，中国地契文书。

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Yi Xu from February to August, 2014. 本收藏由许毅于2014年2月至8月处理. Each folder title contains the following information: Owner: Chinese [Pinyin] -- Seller: Chinese [Pinyin] -- Buyer: Chinese [Pinyin] -- Place: Chinese [Pinyin] -- Type Personal or Government, Date (Chinese & [Western]). 各文件夹包含如下信息： 所有方 -- 卖方 -- 买方 -- 地名 -- 类型 -- 时间。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: The collection of Chinese Land Records at University Library System, University of Pittsburgh include land deeds, property trade documents, possession draw documents, tax bills, etc. It includes 220 pieces that span over three hundred years from the Ming Dynasty (1368-1644) to mid-twentieth century. The majority of them are from Fujian Province and several are from other provinces. 匹兹堡大学图书馆拥有的中国土地文书文献共220份，包括地契、土地买卖文书、家族析产书、土地税收据，等等。时间跨度上自明代(1368-1644)，下至20世纪50年代。除少部分出自其他省份，绝大部分出自于福建省。

For each item the document type is indicated as "Government" or "Personal." "Government" refers to a document with a seal of local government and "Personal" refers to ones without a government seal. 每条记录含有文件类别(Government 或 Personal). 在此，Government和Personal仅用于区分某文件是否有地方政府官印。

Most of this collection contains Chinese land records. However, there are a few of documents that do not belong to this category, such as tax certificates, tax stamps, trademarks, working transfer orders, etc. Since they were purchased as a whole, they were included in this collection as well. 此数据库的绝大部分文件为土地文书，极少数则不属土地文书范畴，如纳税证明，税票，商标，介绍信等。因这些文献与土地文书打包整体购进，故亦包括在此数据库中。
Some of the records have more than one image so be sure to scroll down to see all. 绝大部分记录含一幅图像，少数含两幅以上。若发现描述文字与图像内容有所出入，请向下移动鼠标以确定看到全部图像。

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: An addition to the collection arrived in late 2015. These are indicated in the finding aid by alphabetical letters in the File Folder such as 33A. These 20 folders can be physically found in Box 5.
